title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 461.7 - Type II actions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 461.7 - Type II actions

State Regulations
(a) Actions or
classes of actions which have been determined not to have a significant effect
on the environment are classified as Type II actions. (b) A list of Type II actions is contained in
section
461.17
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
461.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
